meanings.definition: relating to the work of a janitor
meanings.sent1: The janitorial staff keeps the school clean and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The janitorial supplies are stored in the utility closet.
meanings.sent3: The janitorial team made sure every corner sparkled for the inspection.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in the janitorial tasks was like an artist's brush on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the janitorial products lingered in the hallway.

meanings.definition: the job or work of a janitor
meanings.sent1: Janitorial involves cleaning and maintaining buildings.
meanings.sent2: He took on the janitorial at the office to earn extra money.
meanings.sent3: The school's janitorial is never done, but it keeps the place spotless.
meanings.sent4: In the world of janitorial, every spill is a new challenge to conquer.
meanings.sent5: The janitorial of the hospital requires dedication and hard work.

meanings.definition: a person who cleans and maintains a building
meanings.sent1: The janitorial arrived early to start the day's cleaning.
meanings.sent2: She thanked the janitorial for keeping the office so neat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous students played a prank on the janitorial by hiding his mop.
meanings.sent4: The janitorial's cart was like a mobile cleaning station.
meanings.sent5: The school janitorial knew every secret hiding spot for dirt and dust.
